languages.text: {n}Вы так и не понимаете, что за выражение появляется на лице Маражая. Удивление? Злость? Или же разочарование? Однако вы отчетливо вилите, как безумный огонь в его глазах тухнет, словно залитый водой. Выхватив клинки, друкари с надменным смехом смертника встречает ринувшихся на него людей.{/n}

{n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы так и не понимаете, что за выражение появляется на лице Маражая. Удивление? Злость? Или же разочарование? Однако вы отчетливо вилите, как безумный огонь в его глазах тухнет, словно залитый водой. Выхватив клинки, друкари с надменным смехом смертника встречает ринувшихся на него людей.{/n}

But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}那一刻，玛拉斋脸上露出的表情，你恐怕永远都弄不清楚是什么意思。是震惊？是愤怒？还是失望？你只看到，他眼中疯狂的火焰仿佛被一盆冷水迎头浇灭。玛拉斋抽出战刀，露出一丝困兽犹斗的自负笑容，面对着如潮水般涌来的敌人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那一刻，玛拉斋脸上露出的表情，你恐怕永远都弄不清楚是什么意思。是震惊？是愤怒？还是失望？你只看到，他眼中疯狂的火焰仿佛被一盆冷水迎头浇灭。玛拉斋抽出战刀，露出一丝困兽犹斗的自负笑容，面对着如潮水般涌来的敌人。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nunca sabrás con certeza qué emoción delataba la expresión de Marazhai. ¿Sorpresa? ¿Ira? ¿Quizá decepción? Lo que sí puedes ver claramente es el momento en que el fuego demencial de su mirada se extingue como si le hubieran echado un cubo de agua encima. El drukhari desenvaina las espadas y recibe a los humanos que se abalanzan sobre él, profiriendo una carcajada arrogante propia de alguien que se sabe a punto de morir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nunca sabrás con certeza qué emoción delataba la expresión de Marazhai. ¿Sorpresa? ¿Ira? ¿Quizá decepción? Lo que sí puedes ver claramente es el momento en que el fuego demencial de su mirada se extingue como si le hubieran echado un cubo de agua encima. El drukhari desenvaina las espadas y recibe a los humanos que se abalanzan sobre él, profiriendo una carcajada arrogante propia de alguien que se sabe a punto de morir.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous ne déchiffrerez jamais ce qui se cache derrière l'expression de Marazhai. Est-ce de la surprise ? De la colère ? Ou de la déception ? Une chose est certaine, cependant : la flamme dérangée qui brûlait dans ses yeux s'est éteinte subitement. Le Drukhari dégaine ses armes et accueille avec le rire arrogant du condamné les humains qui se précipitent sur lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne déchiffrerez jamais ce qui se cache derrière l'expression de Marazhai. Est-ce de la surprise ? De la colère ? Ou de la déception ? Une chose est certaine, cependant : la flamme dérangée qui brûlait dans ses yeux s'est éteinte subitement. Le Drukhari dégaine ses armes et accueille avec le rire arrogant du condamné les humains qui se précipitent sur lui.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du wirst nie ganz verstehen, was Marazhais Gesichtsausdruck in dem Augenblick zu bedeuten hat. Überraschung? Wut? Oder Enttäuschung? Aber du erkennst deutlich, wie das geistesgestörte Feuer in seinen Augen erlischt, als wenn es mit Wasser gelöscht würde. Der Drukhari zieht seine Klingen und stürmt auf die Crew zu. Dabei lacht er so überheblich wie jemand, dem bald der Tod bevorsteht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du wirst nie ganz verstehen, was Marazhais Gesichtsausdruck in dem Augenblick zu bedeuten hat. Überraschung? Wut? Oder Enttäuschung? Aber du erkennst deutlich, wie das geistesgestörte Feuer in seinen Augen erlischt, als wenn es mit Wasser gelöscht würde. Der Drukhari zieht seine Klingen und stürmt auf die Crew zu. Dabei lacht er so überheblich wie jemand, dem bald der Tod bevorsteht.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの表情に込められた意味を理解することはないだろう。驚きか？怒りか？それとも失望か？ただ、彼の目に宿った狂気の炎が、まるで水を浴びたかのように消えていくのだけははっきりとわかる。デュカーリは刃を抜いて突進してくる人間たちを、死を運命づけられた者の傲慢な笑いで迎え撃った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの表情に込められた意味を理解することはないだろう。驚きか？怒りか？それとも失望か？ただ、彼の目に宿った狂気の炎が、まるで水を浴びたかのように消えていくのだけははっきりとわかる。デュカーリは刃を抜いて突進してくる人間たちを、死を運命づけられた者の傲慢な笑いで迎え撃った。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın ifadesinin altında yatan mananın şaşkınlık mı, öfke mi yoksa hayal kırıklığı mı olduğunu asla kesin olarak çözemeyeceğini biliyorsun. Ancak gözlerinde çılgınlar gibi yanan o ateşin, üzerine su serpilmiş gibi söndüğünü de açıkça görebiliyorsun. Bıçaklarını çeken Drukhari, kendisine doğru saldırıya geçen insanları ölüm mahkûmlarına yaraşan, küstah bir kahkahayla karşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You will never know for certain the meaning behind Marazhai's expression. Surprise? Anger? Or disappointment? But you can clearly see the deranged fire in his eyes go out as if doused with water. Drawing his blades, the Drukhari meets the humans rushing at him with the arrogant laughter of one who is doomed to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın ifadesinin altında yatan manayı asla kesin olarak çözemeyeceksin. Şaşkınlık mıydı? Öfke mi? Yoksa hayal kırıklığı mı? Ancak gözlerinde çılgınlar gibi yanan o ateşin, üzerine su serpilmiş misali söndüğünü açıkça görebiliyorsun. Bıçaklarını çeken Drukhari, kendisine doğru saldırıya geçen insanları ölüm mahkûmlarına yaraşan, küstah bir kahkahayla karşılıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
